originalText.text: Im a Project Manager for Ridgemont Commercial Construction in Irving, TX.  I was in a bind, having trouble finding someone to produce and install a one of a kind custom carpet for the new flagship Chase Bank Branch in Plano, TX.  This bank has finishes from all over the world, glass from England and Germany and Tile from Italy, however right in the main lobby is a one of a kind masterpiece of a seamed carpet, that we would've never been able to pull off, had it not been for the great people at Sherland & Farrington.  I had never heard of them, being from Texas, but they stepped up and proved to us that they were indeed the right/ only contractor for this work.  The office was a pleasure to deal with and their installers were top notch!  We couldn't be happier with our choice in them as our contractor and I can't wait to get them involved in more of my upcoming projects!! Thank you again Sherland and Farrington, Inc.!

originalText.text: Sherland & Farrington did a wonderful job setting up our custom red carpet for our Celebs to enjoy! Customer Service was great! Highly recommend.

text.text: Sherland & Farrington did a wonderful job setting up our custom red carpet for our Celebs to enjoy! Customer Service was great! Highly recommend.

originalText.text: Delivered a flawed product - two sisal floor coverings with curling edges.  Rather than replace the product, they attempted to re-stitch the edging without success, and turned our back on us after that.  Absolutely do not recommend.
